ygData.subject: RE: Evil Eye Bags
ygData.msgSnippet: this happened to me with a regular store-bought backpack, but not my EE bag. luckily it only had a serpentine bracer in it and nothing else.  i have pretty
ygData.messageBody:
this happened to me with a regular store-bought backpack, but not my EE bag.
luckily it only had a serpentine bracer in it and nothing else. i have
pretty important stuff in one regular backpack and my EE bag. i have
screenshots of everything i own just in case.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 23 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 20 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server

> I am told they are 300 plat or so on Mithaniel Marr. I
> bought/traded for one for
> less than that last night but he was asking 325 plat.
>
> By the way I hear they have a nasty bug. Apparently they
> sometimes disappear along
> with everything in them. I plan to be cautious.
